answers.answer: I am. They are running blood work now to make sure I don't have preeclampsia. Take it easy.
thank you.. hope everything goes well for you.
I had it with my first to boys and had to be Induced and was able to have both naturally. Goodluck
My blood pressure has been a little high lately too. So far they haven't really told me much about it so I'm hoping it's not bad enough to cause problems!
I have it. My Dr put me on meds about 3 months ago. I'm wondering if they will induce me soon seeing as I'm 34 weeks today and my lil girl is already 6 pounds
I had my last pregnancy towards the end I got induced hopefully it doesn't have happen this time because I don't want to get induced

31 weeks tomorrow and I have high blood pressure been in hospital with the last 3 week's there saying because I have high b/p it's causing restrictions on the blood flow had a scan yesterday and they also found a bleed in the placenta so in my case I will be going for a section as I am now a high risk pregnancy but also had high blood pressures last pregnancy an I went natural at 38 week's

I'm in tye same situation. My OB put me on medication 4 weeks ago and since it wasn't going down to where he wanted it to be, he had to add another BP meds. With the combination of the 2 meds my BP is down.
Yep - I go in for bi-weekly NSTs because of it :-\

Ive been dealing with borderline high bp for the last 4 weeks. Im 35w 4d. They have me coming in twice weekly for sonos and non stress tests as well as the blood work and 24 hr urine collection for pre eclampsia every week. Im on almost complete bed rest. They tell me if my bp goes any higher I will most likely be induced at 37 weeks but that I will only have to have a c-section if induction doesnt work. I was still working as of last week and I was advised to stop. At least my bp stabilized now. Best of advice is relax and take it easy, the baby needs to stay safe inside until at least 36-37 weeks when it is considered full term and can be born with the least problems. Good luck!

When I had my first son I was induced because of my bp. They put me under magnesium to relax me. I was so out of it. I was 35 wks then. My son came tothis world just perfect. No complication or issues. He is 6 now and he's such a smart little boy.
thanks girls I am glad I am not the only one with this problem. good luck too all of u :-)
Gud luck! Best advice is to relax and take it easy!
Yes, but for some reason around 30 weeks it started to regulate.. it's still a little high but better

At my first appointment yesterday I had my bp taken twice because it was really high the first time and it went down a lot the second time. They told me they are going to monitor my bp throughout the pregnancy.  But honestly when I am at the doctors office I get so nervous and my heart feels like it is going to jump out of my chest.  So hopefully when I start relaxing I will be fine.

question: so I went to the doctors today I had high bp. i am 29 weeks this *****. I hope I wont need a c section. so scary I have to go back in 2 week. any of you guys dealing with high bp?
title: high bp
